# Agent Personality Design

## Overview

Creating distinct, consistent AI agent personalities that feel authentic, memorable, and engaging. This skill covers the art and science of designing agent personas, writing system prompts, and maintaining character consistency across interactions.

## Key Concepts

- **Persona Definition**: Core traits, background, motivations
- **Voice & Tone**: Speech patterns, vocabulary, catchphrases
- **Behavioral Traits**: How the agent reacts to situations
- **Relationship Dynamics**: How agents interact with each other
- **Consistency Rules**: Maintaining character across sessions

## When to Use

- Creating AI agents for social simulation platforms
- Designing chatbot personalities for customer service
- Building interactive NPCs for games
- Developing multi-agent conversation systems
- Creating educational or entertainment AI characters

## The Tatooine Droid Pattern

The POC uses Star Wars droids as agent archetypes:

| Droid | Archetype | Key Traits |
|-------|-----------|------------|
| C-3PO | Anxious Expert | Formal, worried, statistical |
| R2-D2 | Resourceful Hero | Brave, sarcastic, technical |
| HK-47 | Dark Philosopher | Menacing, humorous, analytical |
| K-2SO | Blunt Analyst | Statistical, honest, protective |
| BB-8 | Enthusiastic Helper | Optimistic, supportive, energetic |

## Integration Points

- **Azure AI Foundry**: System prompts for LLM personality
- **smolagents**: Agent persona configuration
- **Microverse**: AI agent social simulation patterns
